text: I agree that 0km only does home delivery and is not responsible for the quantity and quality of food items or anything ordered for delivery.
I agree to pay the final amount as per the restaurant bill along with delivery charge(if any).
I agree that delivery of the items ordered will take time based on multiple criteria like preparation time, distance to travel, etc.
